comments.body: Quote from: Sylvieee on July 27, 2023, 05:43:17 AMFear a lady friend MAY have got taken for a ride by a crowd called "digiruf" [former name "Capital Investments Hub"] - they claim to be out of Texas, USA (which she doesn't live in).¬† Anyone ever heard of them, please?I can't find anything online, which may be bad...or good....any insights appreciated, thank you.Ps. which regulatory agency [if any] in Texas, would one approach over this type of thing, thank you?Op, you have to explain a little bit so that you post can properly understood. I did a search on "digiruf" and I got no result but as for the former name "capital investment hub" I found out that it is an online forex broker. If indeed you're referring to an online broker or anything related to an investment you have to explain more and if possible add more links.As you can see in from the post above mine, without proper information everyone will take your post to be a completely different thing. So do well to edit your post and add more details or just add it as a new reply that is if you ever return to this thread again.
